meanings.definition: Used to express frustration or realization of a mistake.
meanings.sent1: Doh! I forgot my lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: Oh no, I left my keys in the car. Doh!
meanings.sent3: Doh! I accidentally wore mismatched socks to work.
meanings.sent4: In the middle of the test, I realized I studied the wrong chapter. Doh!
meanings.sent5: After waiting in line for an hour, I realized I was in the wrong line. Doh!

meanings.sent1: The song ended with a high doh note.
meanings.sent2: The musician played the doh on the piano.
meanings.sent3: The doh note in the melody made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The doh echoed through the concert hall, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The doh in the symphony was so powerful, it brought tears to my eyes.

meanings.sent1: We spotted a beautiful doh in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The doh gracefully leaped over the fallen log.
meanings.sent3: The curious doh approached our campsite cautiously.
meanings.sent4: The doh's eyes reflected the moonlight in the darkness of the night.
meanings.sent5: The doh's gentle presence in the meadow was a sight to behold.
